== Vakkom (CT) (628475) ==

Vakkom (CT) is a town in the [[Chirayinkeezhu]] taluka of [[Thiruvananthapuram]] district with an area of 6.21 sq. km. and harbouring 4937 households with total population of 19267 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuarm]] is at a distance of 35 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 35 km. Male population is 8319 and female population is 10948. Scheduled Caste population is 2192 and Scheduled Tribes population is 26. Census Location Code of the town is 628475<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 35 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 35 km. Railway station is at Kadakkavoor at a distance of 3 km.
